document_data.name: Pachipol
document_data.mainbody: '''Pachipol''' was the mayor of [[Amah]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Pachipol ruled Amah, one of the [[Free Cities of the Vilhon Reach]].
document_data.History: In 1358 DR, Pachipol participated in a meeting of leaders of both [[Chondath]] and [[Turmish]] to discuss the menace of the [[arcanaloth]] [[Yrkhetep]]. He was choosen by lottery to be spokesperson for the group. He exposed the threat, with the help of the sage [[Inata Eller]], to an adventuring party that had ruined some of Yrkhetep's previous plots. He asked them to go to [[Hades]] and lead the [[Iron Legion]] for the last battle with Yrkhetep.
document_data.Personality: Pachipol appeared to be a passionate individual, caring for his land.
